text: A special camp to make changes in ration cards for residents in Tiruchi West taluk will be held at the R.C. Higher Secondary School in the city on January 9. Residents of the taluk with 93 ration shops can apply for inclusion of names, deletions, corrections in names and changes in addresses in the ration cards during the camp to be held from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. All petitions relating to ration cards would be redressed at the camp. Orders on all petitions will be issued the same day. Meanwhile, two such camps organised at Tiruverumbur and Marungapuri taluks received an overwhelming response on Tuesday as did the camps held in other taluks earlier. While 8,526 petitions were received at Tiruverumbur, 5,634 persons submitted petitions at Marungapuri taluk. In the eight previous camps held in the district, orders were issued on about 50,370 petitions, according to a press release from Collector K.S.Palanisamy.
title: Camp to make changes in ration cards
